NCS: Medication consent form Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},

If you have any questions, feel free to get in touch.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
You can contact our Inclusion team by: Phone: 0333 150 2425 Email: inclusion.support@the-challenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 10am - 6pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
